text: The Evin Prison fire happened on October 15, 2022 around 10:00 local time at the Evin Prison in Tehran, Iran. The fire happened in the fifth week of protests against the Death of Mahsa Amini. At least 8 prisoners were killed and 61 others were injured. Evin Prison is known to hold political activists and journalists, as well as dual and foreign nationals. == References == Category:2022 in Iran Category:Fires in Asia Category:2022 fires Category:October 2022 events
title: Evin Prison fire
